mapper.insert: insert into diff_transition_result (move_id, move_name, difficulty_score, transition_score, details, failed_reason, move_quality_score, move_performance_score, jump_height, turn_body_angle, hit_leg_angle, runup_steps) values (#{moveId}, #{moveName}, #{difficultyScore}, #{transitionScore}, #{details}, #{failedReason}, #{moveQualityScore}, #{movePerformanceScore}, #{jumpHeight}, #{turnBodyAngle},#{hitLegAngle},#{runupSteps})
mapper.select: select * from diff_transition_result order by id desc limit 1
